      • getClass

        public static Class<?> getClass(Type type)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getTypeArguments

        public static <T> List<Class<?>> getTypeArguments(Class<T> baseClass,
                                                  Class<? extends T> childClass)
        Get the actual type arguments a child class has used to extend a generic base class. Ian Robertson; http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=208860
        Type Parameters:
        T - the base class type
        Parameters:
        baseClass - the base class
        childClass - the child class
        Returns:
        a list of the raw classes for the actual type arguments.
